00051 // ===========================================================================
00052 // method definitions
00053 // ===========================================================================
00054 GUILane::GUILane(const std::string& id, SUMOReal maxSpeed, SUMOReal length,
00055                  MSEdge* const edge, unsigned int numericalID,
00056                  const PositionVector& shape, SUMOReal width,
00057                  const SUMOVehicleClasses& allowed,
00058                  const SUMOVehicleClasses& disallowed)
00059     : MSLane(id, maxSpeed, length, edge, numericalID, shape, width, allowed, disallowed) {}
00060 
00061 
00062 GUILane::~GUILane() {
00063     // just to quit cleanly on a failure
00064     if (myLock.locked()) {
00065         myLock.unlock();
00066     }
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 // ------ Vehicle insertion ------
00071 void
00072 GUILane::incorporateVehicle(MSVehicle* veh, SUMOReal pos, SUMOReal speed,
00073                             const MSLane::VehCont::iterator& at,
00074                             MSMoveReminder::Notification notification) {
00075     myLock.lock();
00076     try {
00077         MSLane::incorporateVehicle(veh, pos, speed, at, notification);
00078         myLock.unlock();
00079     } catch (ProcessError&) {
00080         myLock.unlock();
00081         throw;
00082     }
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 // ------ Access to vehicles ------
00087 const MSLane::VehCont&
00088 GUILane::getVehiclesSecure() const {
00089     myLock.lock();
00090     return myVehicles;
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 void
00095 GUILane::releaseVehicles() const {
00096     myLock.unlock();
00097 }

00100 bool
00101 GUILane::moveCritical(SUMOTime t) {
00102     myLock.lock();
00103     try {
00104         bool ret = MSLane::moveCritical(t);
00105         myLock.unlock();
00106         return ret;
00107     } catch (ProcessError&) {
00108         myLock.unlock();
00109         throw;
00110     }
00111 }

00113 
00114 bool
00115 GUILane::setCritical(SUMOTime t, std::vector<MSLane*> &into) {
00116     myLock.lock();
00117     try {
00118         bool ret = MSLane::setCritical(t, into);
00119         myLock.unlock();
00120         return ret;
00121     } catch (ProcessError&) {
00122         myLock.unlock();
00123         throw;
00124     }
00125 }

00128 MSVehicle*
00129 GUILane::removeVehicle(MSVehicle* remVehicle) {
00130     myLock.lock();
00131     try {
00132         MSVehicle* ret = MSLane::removeVehicle(remVehicle);
00133         myLock.unlock();
00134         return ret;
00135     } catch (ProcessError&) {
00136         myLock.unlock();
00137         throw;
00138     }
00139 }

00142 void
00143 GUILane::swapAfterLaneChange(SUMOTime t) {
00144     myLock.lock();
00145     try {
00146         MSLane::swapAfterLaneChange(t);
00147         myLock.unlock();
00148     } catch (ProcessError&) {
00149         myLock.unlock();
00150         throw;
00151     }

00155 bool
00156 GUILane::integrateNewVehicle(SUMOTime t) {
00157     myLock.lock();
00158     try {
00159         bool ret = MSLane::integrateNewVehicle(t);
00160         myLock.unlock();
00161         return ret;
00162     } catch (ProcessError&) {
00163         myLock.unlock();
00164         throw;
00165     }

00169 GUILaneWrapper*
00170 GUILane::buildLaneWrapper(unsigned int index) {
00171     return new GUILaneWrapper(*this, myShape, index);
00172 }

00175 void
00176 GUILane::detectCollisions(SUMOTime timestep) {
00177     myLock.lock();
00178     try {
00179         MSLane::detectCollisions(timestep);
00180         myLock.unlock();
00181     } catch (ProcessError&) {
00182         myLock.unlock();
00183         throw;
00184     }
00185 }
